fastqc_pass_criteria.help_text: JSON file containing definition of an array specifying which items in the FastQC summary.txt are required to have the value PASS for the sample to be considered a pass

fastqc_no_fail_criteria.help_text: JSON file containing definition of an array specifying which items in the FastQC summary.txt are required to NOT have the value FAIL for the sample to be considered a pass (i.e. they could have WARN)

genus_abundance_threshold.help_text: Fail the sample if the top genus abundance is lower than this

species_abundance_threshold.help_text: Fail the sample if the top species abundance is lower than this

publish_clean_reads.help_text: should the pre-processed reads be saved (gzip-compressed) in the preprocessing/ output folder.

debug_preproc_output.help_text: Enable publishing of intermediate output for pre-processing.

compress_clean_reads.help_text: Compress the clean reads files using gzip.

preprocessing_mnf.help_text: (optional) input manifest file for running workflow in isolation.

run_trf.help_text: Run TRF for tandem repeat finding
